definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The worm burrowed its way under the earth.
Heavier rainfall could also cause soil erosion and landslides.
sentences.chinese: 而強降雨也可能導致泥土的腐蝕和山體滑坡。

sentences.english: The farmers tamped down the earth around the base of the seedings .
sentences.chinese: 農民們把幼苗基部四周的泥土壓實。

sentences.english: A dummy is half truck in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一半埋入泥土中的卡車是掩體。

sentences.english: As the rover trundled around, its wheels kicked up soil rich in sulphate.
sentences.chinese: 當漫遊車四處工作時，車輪拖出了富含硫酸鹽的泥土。

sentences.english: It is from this sloughed-off land that the mud volcanoes form.
sentences.chinese: 也正是這種脫落下來的泥土形成了泥火山。

sentences.english: The "crèche" is filled with clay or wood figures called "santons".
sentences.chinese: 那就是用泥土和木頭做成的穆斯林聖人。

sentences.english: City developments, scoop out out, those black muds , send to desert, large.
sentences.chinese: 城市建設，挖掘出來，那些黑色泥土，送去沙漠，大。

sentences.english: The chicken is wrapped in lotus leaves with flavours, then packed around with clay and baked.
sentences.chinese: 雞先被包在荷葉裏面，再包在泥土去爐子裏烤。

sentences.english: Paint is spattered on eyeglasses. Mud lurks under fingernails.
sentences.chinese: 眼鏡被顏料塗上顏色，泥土潛藏在指甲縫間。

sentences.english: The aged walls are made out of clay and wood.
sentences.chinese: 教堂古老的牆壁是用泥土和木頭做的。

sentences.english: The Icelander's small homes were made of earth and leaves.
sentences.chinese: 冰島人住的小房子是用泥土和樹葉蓋起來的。

sentences.english: Sun was breaking through clouds, releasing a smell of earth to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 太陽鑽出了雲層，向空氣中散發出泥土的氣息。

sentences.english: Current research suggests that likely sites for this polymerization were clay or rock surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 這些聚合作用可能發生在泥土或岩石表面。

sentences.english: Like potatoes, turnips are root vegetables that grow in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 和土豆一樣，蘿蔔也是生長在泥土中的根菜類蔬菜。

definition: loess (yellow sandy soil typical of north China)
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
